Man

Suite §

i éstor stiet 
Boston, Mars 
apie 16,94

ear

A

Sleas

me write ones your latest portrait 
which I can Ikleep after than be 
reproduced in a monthly I like 
very much have your pielie as a 
sota remembrance for itu mundey

which

I leas an

I was under sorti 
7 years in whaël 
falterly care.

I do not know where Tommy in 
geng û spend his summer gacalowy 
but I shace tine on noon when I polet 
all him tus cemia Turday Pal L 
New Haven. I have decided to stay 
here for summer sehol lasting sit 
weeks en I shall eutur to stan

Andover a t Noritoppeld where a 
I few Chinne have got la collage, are 
lyon going to leave for your carp regat 
afleru Veommencement

d ? I shall habel 
plant a chances to gain to budover 
to get advertisemel and for orben I

are tu esperenke, share 
télt ups and feetmęs for a la un

een very glad 
lately to learn from m. Ky mot 
wholcome to my place every week 
end from woberce The One 
aultibrity n Phillips Reademy ha 
acain Deślended as an ilitation 
it hold our next annual Conference 
I am glad m. nak has lived

is "rep" never misses any

e Borte Tommy and I 
belul that we have Cheen in Qudra 
long enough and ailended to Conferene 
solicient number a times tolsey 
that we could not get a feller plae 
than Audover for a convention at

a

arrane 
echelef û

fore tu a

call

on

e
raw: Man Suite § i éstor stiet Boston, Mars apie 16,94 ear A Sleas me write ones your latest portrait which I can Ikleep after than be reproduced in a monthly I like very much have your pielie as a sota remembrance for itu mundey which I leas an I was under sorti 7 years in whaël falterly care. I do not know where Tommy in geng û spend his summer gacalowy but I shace tine on noon when I polet all him tus cemia Turday Pal L New Haven. I have decided to stay here for summer sehol lasting sit weeks en I shall eutur to stan Andover a t Noritoppeld where a I few Chinne have got la collage, are lyon going to leave for your carp regat afleru Veommencement d ? I shall habel plant a chances to gain to budover to get advertisemel and for orben I are tu esperenke, share télt ups and feetmęs for a la un een very glad lately to learn from m. Ky mot wholcome to my place every week end from woberce The One aultibrity n Phillips Reademy ha acain Deślended as an ilitation it hold our next annual Conference I am glad m. nak has lived is "rep" never misses any e Borte Tommy and I belul that we have Cheen in Qudra long enough and ailended to Conferene solicient number a times tolsey that we could not get a feller plae than Audover for a convention at a arrane echelef û fore tu a call on e

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter expressing delight that Mr. K. Y. Mok will be at the conference and that the event will be held at Phillips Academy. He considers Andover the best possible venue. He notes that Mr. Mok has appointed Mr. T.V. Song (of Harvard and Columbia) to be the Conference Chairman. Kwan requests photos of Andover Hill and a portrait of Stearns that will serve as advertising. Kwan will stay in Andover for the summer term.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
